query:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS refresh_tokens;

CREATE TABLE refresh_tokens (
  id VARCHAR(36) PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,
  token_hash VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  expires_at DATETIME NOT NULL,
  revoked BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  dispositivo_id VARCHAR(255),
  ip_address VARCHAR(45),
  user_agent TEXT,
  created_at DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX idx_user_id (user_id),
  UNIQUE INDEX idx_token_hash (token_hash),
  INDEX idx_expires (expires_at)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FZ1nxfVKsSpRCQ.c519e6f3483f --database E9go4Z3vKfQ64CyBjNz69u --execute DROP TABLE IF EXISTS refresh_tokens;

CREATE TABLE refresh_tokens (
  id VARCHAR(36) PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL,
  token_hash VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  expires_at DATETIME NOT NULL,
  revoked BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  dispositivo_id VARCHAR(255),
  ip_address VARCHAR(45),
  user_agent TEXT,
  created_at DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX idx_user_id (user_id),
  UNIQUE INDEX idx_token_hash (token_hash),
  INDEX idx_expires (expires_at)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
